entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Ogoki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:06 a.m. EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ogoki Post Airport 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 6 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.5°C

entry.title: Saturday: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets near noon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Ice pellets or snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain after midnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening and after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
